resources.string: Regarding permission
No audio recording permission. \nAll audio function is disabled
Audio recording permission is necessary for video capture with audio.
Audio recording permission is necessary for video capture with audio.
Audio recording permission is necessary for streaming with audio.
Audio recording permission is necessary for streaming with audio.
No permission of writing external storage. \nVideo/still image capturing are disabled.
Permission of writing external storage is necessary for video/still image capturing.
Permission of writing external storage is necessary for video/still image capturing.
No writing external storage permission. \nApp will finish soon
No permission of reading external storage. \nVideo/still image displaying are disabled.
Permission of reading external storage is necessary for video/still image displaying.
Permission of reading external storage is necessary for video/still image displaying.
No reading external storage permission. \nApp will finish soon
No network access permission.
Network access permission is necessary to use this app.
Network access permission is necessary to use this app.
No network access permission. \nApp will finish soon
No permission to access network state
Permission for network state is necessary to detect network connection.
Permission for network state is necessary to detect network connection.
No permission to access network state. \nApp will finish soon
No permission to change network state.
Permission to change network state is necessary to change network connection.
Permission to change network state is necessary to change network connection.
No permission to change network state. \nApp will finish soon
No permission to read Wi-Fi state.
App needs permission to read Wi-Fi state.
App needs permission to read Wi-Fi state.
No permission to read Wi-Fi state.\nAoo wil finish soon.
No permission to read phone state.
App needs permission to read phone state.
App needs permission to read phone state.
No permission to read phone state.\nApp wil finish soon.
No permission to read phone number.
App needs permission to read phone number.
App needs permission to read phone number.
No permission to read phone number.\nApp will finish soon.
No permission to read SMS.
App needs permission to read SMS.\nThis permission is also required when app needs to read phone number.
App needs permission to read SMS.\nThis permission is also required when app needs to read phone number.
No permission to read SMS.\nApp wil finish soon.
No location access permission
Location access permission is necessary to save location.
Location access permission is necessary to save location.
No location access permission. \nApp will finish soon
Background location access permission is necessary on Android10 and later devices.
Background location access permission is necessary on Android10 and later devices.\n After app settings screen is shown, please select %s.
No camera access permission
No camera access permission. \nApp will finish soon
Camera access permission is necessary to still/video capture.
To access UVC device on Android9 and later, app needs camera permission.
Camera access permission is necessary for fallback to built in camera.
